Debbie they are awesome!  They take us to an all time high!
   
  Juli

Kristin Morris <ckmorris95@...> wrote:
              Hi Debbie � I just listened to your files and they are really amazing.  On the technical side of this the clips are very clear and easily understood.  On the emotional side.. well .. wow.  Congrats hun.
  k
  
      
---------------------------------
  
  From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of misujoey
Sent: Tuesday, April 01, 2008 5:27 PM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: MiniBox - My Son Joey speaking?

  
        Thanks Margaret & Stefan .. It was really hard (actually heart-
breaking) at first for me to speak into a radio to see if my Son 
would answer ... it's a little easier now and I really appreciate all 
the hard work and effort you all are putting into Evp and Radio-Sweep 
research ...

Debbie

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Stefan Bion <yahoogroups@...> wrote:
>
> Hi Debbie,
> 
> yes, these are very nice recordings which I can hear well. :)
> 
> Stefan
> 
> -- 
> 
> > I just posted two files in "Debbie's Recordings/MiniBox/Messages 
from 
> > Heaven/ .... I'm hoping it's my Son Joey speaking ..
> 
> > Debbie
>
